fileDescription: Strings for Pin to image point.

rex_pin2imgpt.name: Pin to image point
rex_pin2imgpt.description: Stick to another object's image point.

ispinned0.description: Object is currently pinned to another object.

pin1.description: Pin the object to another object's image point.

obj.name: Pin to
obj.desc: Choose the object to pin to.

imgpt.name: ImagePoint
imgpt.desc: Name or number of image point to get.

mode_.name: Mode
mode_.desc: Choose which properties of the object to update.

pinneduid0.description: Get the UID of the object pinned to, or -1 if not pinned.
